method.name: PUT
method.id: Set SAML 2.0 session footprint store to distributed map
method.doc: Configure the SAML 2.0 session footprint store.

The SAML 2.0 session footprint can be stored in the HVDB, Redis or the Distributed Session Cache (DSC). Select Distributed Map if the SAML 2.0 session needs to be stored in the HVDB or Redis. When the option is switched to DSC the SAML 2.0 session gets stored in the Distributed Session Cache. The SAML 2.0 session is stored in the HVDB by default.
To complete this operation with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP PUT command on the override configs URI.
